# fundcat

Usage:
```
fundcat.py [-h] [--since SINCE] [--interval_days INTERVAL_DAYS] [--period PERIOD] [--download DOWNLOAD]
```

Example:

```
python3 fundcat.py --since 2022-10-01 --interval_days 7 --period 14 --download True
```
